main event: A civilian observer reported a sighting of a bright round object in Colorado Springs, Colorado on 2 October 1966.
interesting points: The object was described as white and very bright,The observer noted that it appeared to have things shooting from it,The sighting lasted for nearly one hour,The observation was made from the observer's house,There was a full moon visible during the time of the sighting.
sighted object: one bright round object emitting light
